title: React Web APIs
subtitle: Testing Web APIs With React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + Parcel

pageVisibility.title: Page Visibility
pageVisibility.subtitle: The Page Visibility API let you know when a document becomes visible or hidden, as well as features to look at the current visibility state of the page.

resizeObserver.title: Resize Observer
resizeObserver.subtitle: The Resize Observer API provides a performant mechanism by which code can monitor an element for changes to its size.

webCrypto.title: Web Crypto
webCrypto.subtitle: The Web Crypto API is an interface allowing a script to use cryptographic primitives in order to build systems using cryptography.
